about_the_game:
A collaboration with the anime My Deer Friend Nokotan!

For a limited time only, selecting the “Dance” command in-game will let you do the Shikanoko Dance accompanied by the My Deer Friend Nokotan opening theme “Shikairo Days”.

Distribution Period: 10:00 AM January 7 to 9:59 AM February 4, 2025 (PST)

Note: This collaboration is not available in the following regions due to reasons regarding copyright: China, Taiwan, Korea, Malaysia, the Philippines, and Indonesia.
Note: The dance is available for a limited time only. This DLC will no longer be distributed and the in-game dance will no longer be available once the distribution period has passed.

©Oshioshio・Kodansha / Hinominami High School Deer Club
©2024 Bandai Namco Music Live Inc.
JASRAC A-9040597001Y43032
JASRAC A-9040597002Y43032
